titles: A pleasant new ballad, shewing how Sir Iohn Armstrong and Nathaniel Musgrave fell in love with Lady Dacres daughter of the north; and of the strife that was between them for her, and how they wrought the death of one hundred men. To a new northern tune.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright.,
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
